p: The capacity of M. longifolia leave extracts (essential oil; hydroethanolic extract and its fractions) to scavenge the free-radical 2, 2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH) was determined according to the method described by Trigui et al. [ 18] with slight modifications. In Brief, a dosage of 50 Î¼l of the extract assayed at different concentrations was added to 2 ml of a DPPH solution (0.04 g/l in methanol). The mixtures were incubated for 30 min in the dark at room temperature.
